document.masterDocTitle: A Review of the Genus Cryptorhynchus Illiger 1807 in the United States and Canada (Curculionidae: Cryptorhynchinae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A Review of the Genus Cryptorhynchus Illiger 1807 in the United States and Canada (Curculionidae: Cryptorhynchinae)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Fig. 24 . This species is found in the United States in AR, CT, D.C., FL, GA, IA, IL, IN, KS, KY, LA, MD, MI, MO, NC, NE, NJ, NY, PA, SC, TN, VA, WV (O’Brien & Wibmer 1982; specimens examined herein).
